snippet: No one at PBS guessed that the opening episode of Season 3 of “Downton Abbey” would surpass the viewer numbers for some networks.
abstract: Opening episode of Season 3 of PBS' British period drama Downton Abbey attracts at least 7.9 million viewers, surpassing viewer numbers of some commercial broadcasters that night.
lead_paragraph: No one at PBS guessed that the opening episode of Season 3 of “Downton Abbey” would surpass the viewer numbers for some networks.

headline.seo: ‘Downton Abbey’ Audience Swells for Season’s First Episode
headline.main: No Savior Needed for This Old House
headline.print_headline: No Savior Needed for This Old House
